page.title: 15CARSPHAIRN VILLAGE SHOP
page.content: {LAWRENCE & CO.} The village shop provides many of the basic essentials and some of the luxuries for everyday living in Carsphairn.It was built as a shop in 1885.At that time, farming supplies, such as sheep dip and saddles were also sold. Nowadays, the shop sells sweets, cigarettes, ice cream, groceries,fruit and vegetables and newspapers.There are about forty to fifty customers a day. Many of them are from Carsphairn village, although in the summer there are also a lot of tourists _ some of them foreigners.Most of the supplies are from firms in Ayr, Dumfries and Glasgow.
